official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Export-Import Bank of the United States should delay establishing its proposed special "facilities" to extend guarantees and insurance to the Government of Mexico and the Government of Brazil until the Congress has an opportunity to review such transactions.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Export-Import Bank should delay extending specified amounts in guarantees and insurance to Mexico and Brazil until the Congress has examined such proposed guarantees and insurance in light of the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 and the budget and appropriations process for FY 1984.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Export-Import Bank of the United States should delay establishing its proposed special "facilities" to extend guarantees and insurance to the Government of Mexico and the Government of Brazil until the Congress has an opportunity to review such transactions.
